statements: DELETE FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE SensorType = 'Temperature' AND SensorValue > 50
DELETE FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE DeviceID = 1 AND SensorType = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE SensorValue > 50 AND Timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE device_id = 100 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM Predictive_Maintenance_Log WHERE maintenance_action = 'Replace sensor' AND device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE temperature > 30)
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='temperature' AND sensor_value > 30;
